In the Art of Communication course, I learned a wide range of skills and techniques that helped me improve my communication abilities in various contexts. Firstly, I gained knowledge on building self-confidence and self-esteem, which enabled me to feel more comfortable and secure when speaking in front of an audience. I also learned techniques to overcome glossophobia or the fear of public speaking.

The course covered different frameworks for building confidence and managing nervousness while speaking, and I learned about the importance of analyzing the audience's structure to tailor my message and delivery accordingly. Additionally, the course provided me with an articulation framework that helped me speak clearly and effectively.

Another key aspect of the course was learning about persuasion techniques that could help me present my ideas convincingly and with impact. I learned how to deliver speeches like a rockstar, capturing the audience's attention and engaging them throughout the presentation.

The course also focused on personal branding and maintaining a LinkedIn profile, which is essential for career advancement and networking. I gained knowledge on how to communicate confidently, using effective listening and conversation techniques, and learned how to build a professional network.

Overall, the Art of Communication course provided me with a comprehensive set of skills and knowledge that has helped me become a more confident and effective communicator in both personal and professional settings.
